00017     MagneticFieldMap3D::MagneticFieldMap3D(const char* filename, double xOffset, double yOffset, double zOffset) :
00018             nx_(0), ny_(0), nz_(0), xOffset_(xOffset), yOffset_(yOffset), zOffset_(zOffset), invertX_(false), invertY_(false), invertZ_(false) {
00019 
00020         ifstream file(filename); // Open the file for reading.
00021 
00022         // Throw an error if file does not exist.
00023         if (!file.good()) {
00024             G4cerr << "ERROR: Field map file " << filename << " does not exist!" << std::endl;
00025             throw std::runtime_error("The field map file does not exist.");
00026         }
00027 
00028         G4cout << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << G4endl;
00029         G4cout << "    Magnetic Field Map 3D" << G4endl;
00030         G4cout << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << G4endl<< G4endl;
00031 
00032         G4cout << "Reading the field grid from " << filename << " ... " << endl;
00033         G4cout << "  Offsets: " << xOffset << " " << yOffset << " " << zOffset << G4endl;
00034 
00035         // Ignore first blank line
00036         char buffer[256];
00037         file.getline(buffer, 256);
00038 
00039         // Read table dimensions 
00040         file >> nx_ >> ny_ >> nz_; // Note dodgy order
00041 
00042         G4cout << "  Number of values: " << nx_ << " " << ny_ << " " << nz_ << G4endl;
00043 
00044         // Set up storage space for table
00045         xField_.resize(nx_);
00046         yField_.resize(nx_);
00047         zField_.resize(nx_);
00048         int ix, iy, iz;
00049         for (ix = 0; ix < nx_; ix++) {
00050             xField_[ix].resize(ny_);
00051             yField_[ix].resize(ny_);
00052             zField_[ix].resize(ny_);
00053             for (iy = 0; iy < ny_; iy++) {
00054                 xField_[ix][iy].resize(nz_);
00055                 yField_[ix][iy].resize(nz_);
00056                 zField_[ix][iy].resize(nz_);
00057             }
00058         }
00059 
00060         // Ignore other header information    
00061         // The first line whose second character is '0' is considered to
00062         // be the last line of the header.
00063         do {
00064             file.getline(buffer, 256);
00065         } while (buffer[1] != '0');
00066 
00067         // Read in the data
00068         double xval, yval, zval, bx, by, bz;
00069         for (ix = 0; ix < nx_; ix++) {
00070             for (iy = 0; iy < ny_; iy++) {
00071                 for (iz = 0; iz < nz_; iz++) {
00072                     file >> xval >> yval >> zval >> bx >> by >> bz;
00073                     if (ix == 0 && iy == 0 && iz == 0) {
00074                         minx_ = xval;
00075                         miny_ = yval;
00076                         minz_ = zval;
00077                     }
00078                     xField_[ix][iy][iz] = bx;
00079                     yField_[ix][iy][iz] = by;
00080                     zField_[ix][iy][iz] = bz;
00081                 }
00082             }
00083         }
00084         file.close();
00085 
00086         maxx_ = xval;
00087         maxy_ = yval;
00088         maxz_ = zval;
00089 
00090         G4cout << "  ... done reading " << G4endl<< G4endl;
00091         G4cout << "Read values of field from file " << filename << G4endl;
00092         G4cout << "  Assumed the order: x, y, z, Bx, By, Bz" << G4endl;
00093         G4cout << "  Min values: " << minx_ << " " << miny_ << " " << minz_ << " mm " << G4endl;
00094         G4cout << "  Max values: " << maxx_ << " " << maxy_ << " " << maxz_ << " mm " << G4endl;
00095         G4cout << "  Field offsets: " << xOffset_ << " " << yOffset_ << " " << zOffset_ << " mm " << G4endl<< G4endl;
00096 
00097         // Should really check that the limits are not the wrong way around.
00098         if (maxx_ < minx_) {
00099             swap(maxx_, minx_);
00100             invertX_ = true;
00101         }
00102         if (maxy_ < miny_) {
00103             swap(maxy_, miny_);
00104             invertY_ = true;
00105         }
00106         if (maxz_ < minz_) {
00107             swap(maxz_, minz_);
00108             invertZ_ = true;
00109         }
00110 
00111         G4cout << "After reordering if necessary" << G4endl;
00112         G4cout << "  Min values: " << minx_ << " " << miny_ << " " << minz_ << " mm " << G4endl;
00113         G4cout << "  Max values: " << maxx_ << " " << maxy_ << " " << maxz_ << " mm " << G4endl;;
00114 
00115         dx_ = maxx_ - minx_;
00116         dy_ = maxy_ - miny_;
00117         dz_ = maxz_ - minz_;
00118 
00119         G4cout << "  Range of values: " << dx_ << " " << dy_ << " " << dz_ << " mm" << G4endl<< G4endl;
00120         G4cout << "Done loading field map" << G4endl<< G4endl;
00121         G4cout << "-----------------------------------------------------------" << G4endl<< G4endl;
00122     }
00123 
00124     void MagneticFieldMap3D::GetFieldValue(const double point[4], double *bfield) const {
00125 
00126         double x = point[0] - xOffset_;
00127         double y = point[1] - yOffset_;
00128         double z = point[2] - zOffset_;
00129 
00130         // Check that the point is within the defined region 
00131         if (x >= minx_ && x <= maxx_ && y >= miny_ && y <= maxy_ && z >= minz_ && z <= maxz_) {
00132 
00133             // Position of given point within region, normalized to the range
00134             // [0,1]
00135             double xfraction = (x - minx_) / dx_;
00136             double yfraction = (y - miny_) / dy_;
00137             double zfraction = (z - minz_) / dz_;
00138 
00139             if (invertX_) {
00140                 xfraction = 1 - xfraction;
00141             }
00142             if (invertY_) {
00143                 yfraction = 1 - yfraction;
00144             }
00145             if (invertZ_) {
00146                 zfraction = 1 - zfraction;
00147             }
00148 
00149             // Need addresses of these to pass to modf below.
00150             // modf uses its second argument as an OUTPUT argument.
00151             double xdindex, ydindex, zdindex;
00152 
00153             // Position of the point within the cuboid defined by the
00154             // nearest surrounding tabulated points
00155             double xlocal = (std::modf(xfraction * (nx_ - 1), &xdindex));
00156             double ylocal = (std::modf(yfraction * (ny_ - 1), &ydindex));
00157             double zlocal = (std::modf(zfraction * (nz_ - 1), &zdindex));
00158 
00159             // The indices of the nearest tabulated point whose coordinates
00160             // are all less than those of the given point
00161             int xindex = static_cast<int>(xdindex);
00162             int yindex = static_cast<int>(ydindex);
00163             int zindex = static_cast<int>(zdindex);
00164 
00165 #ifdef DEBUG_INTERPOLATING_FIELD
00166             G4cout << "Local x,y,z: " << xlocal << " " << ylocal << " " << zlocal << G4endl;
00167             G4cout << "Index x,y,z: " << xindex << " " << yindex << " " << zindex << G4endl;
00168             double valx0z0, mulx0z0, valx1z0, mulx1z0;
00169             double valx0z1, mulx0z1, valx1z1, mulx1z1;
00170             valx0z0= table[xindex ][0][zindex]; mulx0z0= (1-xlocal) * (1-zlocal);
00171             valx1z0= table[xindex+1][0][zindex]; mulx1z0= xlocal * (1-zlocal);
00172             valx0z1= table[xindex ][0][zindex+1]; mulx0z1= (1-xlocal) * zlocal;
00173             valx1z1= table[xindex+1][0][zindex+1]; mulx1z1= xlocal * zlocal;
00174 #endif
00175 
00176             // Full 3-dimensional version
00177             bfield[0] = xField_[xindex][yindex][zindex] * (1 - xlocal) * (1 - ylocal) * (1 - zlocal) + xField_[xindex][yindex][zindex + 1] * (1 - xlocal) * (1 - ylocal) * zlocal + xField_[xindex][yindex + 1][zindex] * (1 - xlocal) * ylocal * (1 - zlocal) + xField_[xindex][yindex + 1][zindex + 1] * (1 - xlocal) * ylocal * zlocal + xField_[xindex + 1][yindex][zindex] * xlocal * (1 - ylocal) * (1 - zlocal) + xField_[xindex + 1][yindex][zindex + 1] * xlocal * (1 - ylocal) * zlocal + xField_[xindex + 1][yindex + 1][zindex] * xlocal * ylocal * (1 - zlocal) + xField_[xindex + 1][yindex + 1][zindex + 1] * xlocal * ylocal * zlocal;
00178             bfield[1] = yField_[xindex][yindex][zindex] * (1 - xlocal) * (1 - ylocal) * (1 - zlocal) + yField_[xindex][yindex][zindex + 1] * (1 - xlocal) * (1 - ylocal) * zlocal + yField_[xindex][yindex + 1][zindex] * (1 - xlocal) * ylocal * (1 - zlocal) + yField_[xindex][yindex + 1][zindex + 1] * (1 - xlocal) * ylocal * zlocal + yField_[xindex + 1][yindex][zindex] * xlocal * (1 - ylocal) * (1 - zlocal) + yField_[xindex + 1][yindex][zindex + 1] * xlocal * (1 - ylocal) * zlocal + yField_[xindex + 1][yindex + 1][zindex] * xlocal * ylocal * (1 - zlocal) + yField_[xindex + 1][yindex + 1][zindex + 1] * xlocal * ylocal * zlocal;
00179             bfield[2] = zField_[xindex][yindex][zindex] * (1 - xlocal) * (1 - ylocal) * (1 - zlocal) + zField_[xindex][yindex][zindex + 1] * (1 - xlocal) * (1 - ylocal) * zlocal + zField_[xindex][yindex + 1][zindex] * (1 - xlocal) * ylocal * (1 - zlocal) + zField_[xindex][yindex + 1][zindex + 1] * (1 - xlocal) * ylocal * zlocal + zField_[xindex + 1][yindex][zindex] * xlocal * (1 - ylocal) * (1 - zlocal) + zField_[xindex + 1][yindex][zindex + 1] * xlocal * (1 - ylocal) * zlocal + zField_[xindex + 1][yindex + 1][zindex] * xlocal * ylocal * (1 - zlocal) + zField_[xindex + 1][yindex + 1][zindex + 1] * xlocal * ylocal * zlocal;
00180 
00181         } else {
00182             bfield[0] = 0.0;
00183             bfield[1] = 0.0;
00184             bfield[2] = 0.0;
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188 } // namespace
